newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Boston Properties started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Boston Properties started.

text.p: Bear Stearns confirmed on Friday it started coverage of Boston Properties Inc with a buy rating and a 12-month price target of $37 per share.
-- Analyst Chris George said his 1997 funds from operations estimate was $1.95 per share and his 1998 FFO estimate was $2.30 per share.
-- George said he believed the company was one of the best positioned to consolidate the New York office market.
-- "Investors will come to value its development expertise as it continues to deliver high-yielding projects over the coming months," he said.
